name: TapGugu(탭구구단)
description:
TapGugu is an application that you can have fun while learning multiplication tables

Elementary school students to start learning the multiplication tables
And The multiplication tables app that everyone can enjoy .

TapGugu is a brain development application that allows searching wits , calculate the multiplication tables .

◈Features of TapGugu APP
- Not just learning multiplication tables app , the app more interesting game .
- Elementary school students as well as anyone can enjoy .
- 9Table, 19Table TapGame may as well be studied by studying the menu.
- And to friends and people around the world you can boast and share their scores .
- Depending on the options you can control the speed and score .

◈Menu TapGugu APP

- 9Table
You can learn through fun TapGame.
The more score falling faster block.
So, without boring you get the fun and sense of accomplishment.

- 19Table
9Table and style is the same.
However , the more likely points that can be obtained because of more difficult .

- Study
Looking easier to 9Table & 19Table charts can be studied.
And the answer to hide or show can be studied.

- Rank
You can enjoy the rank with people .

- Option
Easy, Normal, Hard
Speed ??coming down the block and score will vary depending on options.

◈Coming soon TapGugu APP
Multiplication table singing
